metadata.Title: CVE-2021-23926 on Ubuntu 20.04 ESM (focal) - medium.
metadata.Description:
The XML parsers used by XMLBeans up to version 2.6.0 did not set the properties needed to protect the user from malicious XML input. Vulnerabilities include possibilities for XML Entity Expansion attacks. Affects XMLBeans up to and including v2.6.0.

Update Instructions:

Run `sudo pro fix CVE-2021-23926` to fix the vulnerability. The problem can be corrected
by updating your system to the following package versions:

libxmlbeans-java - 3.0.2-1
xmlbeans - 3.0.2-1
No subscription required

criterions.comment: xmlbeans package in focal, is related to the CVE in some way and has been fixed (note: '3.0.2-1').
